headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Otis Worldwide (OTIS) Securing Major Hyderabad Deal and Sustainability Award
summary: Earlier this month, Otis India announced a significant partnership with My Home Group to provide 169 next-generation elevator systems for three luxury residential projects in Hyderabad, highlighting Otis's continued presence in high-profile real estate developments across Asia. At the same time, Otis Worldwide has been recognized by Newsweek for the third consecutive year as one of America’s Greenest Companies, underscoring its commitment to integrating sustainability and energy-efficient...
